item.title: How_to_check_glibc_version_of_a_binary_in build_time
item.description: There are several ways to check the glibc version that a binary file depends on:: ldd command ldd binary_file objdump, disassembly objdump -T binary_file | grep -i glibc readelf readelf -d binary_file | grep libc check dynamic section to get libc versionã€‚ check the source code repo If you can access...
